author: Fextralife
description:
First Berserker Khazan - Greatsword Build Guide - Best Skills, Best Sets & Best Phantom 
Use the Greatsword like a Pro!
In this The First Berserker Khazan video, I'm going to kind of walk you guys through my greatsword build, what carried me through the game. There are definitely multiple ways you can play the greatsword. I think the general combat style is going to be the same more or less for most players, but you may pick and choose different sets with different skills that you like. But I kinda want to walk you through the fundamentals of what I found to work for the Greatsword.

Wiki: https://firstberserkerkhazan.wiki.fextralife.com/First+Berserker+Khazan+Wiki

Timestamps
0:00 - Greatsword Guide
0:30 - Stats & Agility
2:26 - Skills and Passives
10:23 - Armor Sets
14:06 - Phantoms

Don't forget to like the video and subscribe to our channel for more!

title: First Berserker Khazan Greatsword Guide - Best Skills, Best Sets & Best Phantom for the Greatsword
